SEARCH
Module com.example.dicegame
Package controllers

Class DeckScreenController

java.lang.Object
controllers.DeckScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class DeckScreenController extends Object implements Controller
The controller class for managing the deck screen in the dice game application. It handles the interactions between the market, the player's deck, and the UI elements on the screen.

  • Nested Class Summary

    private class 
    DeckScreenController.ShadowTransition
    Custom transition to animate the shadow effect of dice images.

      Parameters:

      dice - The dice associated with the ImageView.
